Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is meticulously crafted and offers unparalleled benefits in its category. Considering its exceptional quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for an exclusive price of $15000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of providing you with this remarkable product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
